name: Mayo Parmesan Chicken with Rice
author: amschu
summary: Quick, easy, and gluten-free recipe in less than 1 hour. This is a modified version of the original mayo chicken recipe on this site.
ingredients: freshly ground black pepper to taste
2  skinless, boneless chicken breast halves, halved horizontally
¾ cup grated Parmesan cheese, or more to taste
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Whisk mayonnaise, garlic, rosemary, salt, and black pepper together in a bowl
Spread mayonnaise mixture evenly over each piece of chicken
Spread rice out into the bottom of a 9x13-inch baking dish
Place chicken pieces on top of rice and top with Parmesan cheese
Bake in the preheated oven until chicken breasts are no longer pink in the center and the juices run clear, 35 to 45 minutes
An instant-read thermometer inserted into the center should read at least 165 degrees F (74 degrees C)
